title: games that exit by themselves causing low priority punishments
body:
Im quite disappointed with the game because it when the game is about to start it exits by itself and then gives me lowest priority.
this has happened 3 times and now i have to wait 20minutes i find this very annoying.
i hope that riot will do something about it.

replies.body:
It sounds like you may be failing to connect to the gameservers, causing your client to disconnect from the game platform. I suggest you ensure your local network settings are configured properly for League by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in its entirety.

Please let me know if this resolved your issue.
has anyone faced the same problem?
